metadata.description: This data was derived from "1: 100,000 Land Use Data of China". Based on Landsat MSS, TM and ETM remote sensing data, 1: 100,000 Land Use Data of China was compiled within three years by a remote sensing scientific and technological team of 19 research institutes affiliated to the Chinese Academy of Sciences, which was organized by the “Remote Sensing Macroinvestigation and Dynamic Research on the National Resources and Environment", one of the major application programs in Chinese Academy of Sciences during the "Eighth Five-year Plan". This data adopts a hierarchical land cover classification system, which divides the country into 6 first-class categories (cultivated land, forest land, grassland, water area, urban and rural areas, industrial and mining areas, residential land and unused land) and 31 second-class categories. This is the most accurate land use data product in our country at present. It has already played an important role in national land resources survey, hydrology and ecological research.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据来源于“中国1:10万土地利用数据”。中国1:10万土地利用数据是由中国科学院“八五”重大应用项目《全国资源环境遥感宏观调查与动态研究》组织了中国科学院所属19个研究所的遥感科技队伍，以卫星遥感为手段，在三年内基于Landsat MSS，TM和ETM遥感数据构建的。本数据采用一个分层的土地覆盖分类系统，将全国分为6个一级类（耕地、林地、草地、水域、城乡、工矿、居民用地和未利用土地），31个二级类。这是目前我国精度最高的土地利用数据产品，已经在国家土地资源调查、水文、生态研究中发挥着重要作用。

background: Land-use/cover change has become an event being of paramount importance to the study of global environmental change. Land-cover change is closely related to the terrestrial surface material cycles and life-support processes, i.e., the interaction between biosphere and atmosphere, biodiversity, biogeochemical cycle and sustainable exploitation of resources. The series of scientific study programs, issued and promoted by IGBP and IHDP in 1995, make the study of land-use and land-cover change (LUCC) become one of the hot topics in the global environmental change study. As a developing but booming country, China has formulated a series of policies exerting great influence on the land-use change. In addition, due to varied physical environments and vast land areas, its land-use changes not only influence the social and economic development but also impact the global change accordingly.
research objective: In this paper, the division of dynamic regionalization of land-use change is designed, for the sake of revealing the temporal and spatial features of land-use change and laying the foundation for the study of regional scale land-use changes. The paper exerts an effective effort on the integrated studies of “spatial pattern” and “temporal process” for land-use change to reveal the regional land-use change characteristics on the pattern of dynamic process and dynamic process of pattern.
challenges: It is too early to say that the trend of deforestation has been effectively reversed across China. There also exist conspicuous conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion, as showed in the irrational conversion from arable land to built-up areas.
dataset: The main data sources are Landsat TM digital images (520 scenes in 1995/1996 and 508 scenes in 1999/2000). Apart from that, the CBERS-1 (China-Brazil Earth Resources Satellite 1) data were also used to acquire land-use information for 1999/2000.
findings: There exists conspicuous regional differentiation of land-use change in China, which lays the foundation to draw the dynamic zones. The rapid change of land-use change during 1995—2000 happened in North China, Loess Plateau—agricultural and pasturing interlaced area, Northeast China, southeast coastal region, middle and lower reaches of Yangtze River, eastern coastal region.
backgroundCn: 土地利用/覆盖变化已成为全球环境变化研究中至关重要的事件。土地覆盖变化与陆地表面物质循环和生命支持过程密切相关，即生物圈与大气、 biodiversity、生物地球化学循环以及资源的可持续开发之间的相互作用。1995年，国际全球变化研究计划（IGBP）和国际人文与社会科学计划（IHDP）发布并推动的一系列科学研究项目，使得土地利用和土地覆盖变化（LUCC）的研究成为全球环境变化研究的热门话题。作为一个发展中但蓬勃发展的国家，中国制定了一系列对土地利用变化产生重大影响的政策。此外，由于物理环境的多样性和广阔的土地面积，其土地利用变化不仅影响社会和经济发展，也相应地影响全球变化。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，土地利用变化的动态区域划分旨在揭示土地利用变化的时间和空间特征，并为区域尺度土地利用变化的研究奠定基础。本文有效地对土地利用变化的“空间模式”和“时间过程”进行了综合研究，以揭示区域土地利用变化特征在动态过程的模式和动态模式的过程。
challengesCn: 目前还为时尚早，无法说中国的森林砍伐趋势已经有效逆转。同时，耕地保护与城市扩张之间也存在明显的冲突，表现为耕地向建筑用地的不合理转化。
datasetCn: 主要数据来源是Landsat TM数字图像（1995/1996年的520幅场景和1999/2000年的508幅场景）。此外，还使用了CBERS-1（中巴地球资源卫星1号）数据来获取1999/2000年的土地利用信息。
findingsCn: 中国的土地利用变化存在明显的区域差异，这为划分动态区域奠定了基础。在1995年至2000年期间，土地利用变化的快速变化发生在华北、黄土高原—农业与牧区交错区、东北地区、东南沿海地区、长江中下游地区以及东部沿海地区。

background: Land cover plays a significant role in Earth system science, which reflects the influence of human activities and environmental changes. Reliable and up-to-date land cover data are very important for land, ecological and hydrological modelling, carbon and water cycle study as well as global climatic change study. Many land use/cover maps at global, continental, and regional scales have been produced in recent years using remote sensing. These four global land cover maps are all derived from remote sensing data and created for the same fundamental purpose of providing improved land cover information for scientific studies and environmental monitoring, but they are different in mapping methods, data sources, and classification systems.
research objective: The objective of this paper is to evaluate the application of the four popular land cover maps over China land mass. The possibility of developing a new land cover map whose classification is compatible with a well-accepted legend system but whose accuracy is more reliable also motivates this study.
challenges: The four maps used different classification systems, which made the comparison difficult. We conclude that the accuracies of all the datasets cannot meet the requirements of land surface modelling. For the reference data, i.e. the 1:100 000 land cover map, the classification system needs to be transferred to a well-recognized one that has been used commonly in land surface modelling.
methods: We compare and evaluate four land cover datasets over China. So we first aggregated these maps by reclassifying them using a unified legend system. A large-scale, i.e. 1:100 000 land cover map of China was used as the reference data to validate the four maps.
dataset: The datasets include the Version 2 global land cover dataset of IGBP, MODIS land cover map 2001, a global land cover map produced by the University of Maryland, and the land cover map produced by the global land cover for the year 2000 (GLC 2000) project coordinated by the Global Vegetation Monitoring Unit of the European Commission Joint Research Centre. The large-scale (1:100 000) land use map of China in 2000, which was produced by Chinese Academy of Science to meet large-scale resource survey and land use mapping, was used as truth to validate the four land cover maps over China.
findings: The results show that the GLC2000 land cover map represents the highest accuracy. The MODIS land cover map ranks second for type area consistency and third for sub-fraction overall accuracy compared with reference data. The IGBP land cover map has good labelling accuracy, although it has a local labelling error and third consistency for type area. The labelling accuracy and type area consistency for the reference data of UMd land cover map is low.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖在地球系统科学中发挥着重要作用，反映了人类活动和环境变化的影响。可靠和最新的土地覆盖数据对于土地、生态和水文建模、碳和水循环研究以及全球气候变化研究非常重要。近年来，许多全球、大陆和区域尺度的土地利用/覆盖图是利用遥感技术制作的。这四个全球土地覆盖图都是基于遥感数据生成的，旨在为科学研究和环境监测提供改进的土地覆盖信息，但它们在制图方法、数据来源和分类系统上有所不同。
research objectiveCn: 本文的目的是评估四种流行的中国土地覆盖地图的应用。开发一种新的土地覆盖地图的可能性也是本研究的动机，该地图的分类与一个公认的图例系统兼容，但其准确性更可靠。
challengesCn: 这四个地图使用了不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得困难。我们得出结论，所有数据集的准确性都无法满足土地表面建模的要求。对于参考数据，即1:100,000的土地覆盖图，分类系统需要转化为一个在土地表面建模中常用的公认系统。
methodsCn: 我们对中国的四个土地覆盖数据集进行了比较和评估。首先，我们通过使用统一的图例系统对这些地图进行了重新分类。我们使用了一幅大比例尺（1:100,000）的中国土地覆盖图作为参考数据来验证这四幅地图。
datasetCn: 数据集包括IGBP的版本2全球土地覆盖数据集、2001年MODIS土地覆盖图、由马里兰大学制作的全球土地覆盖图，以及由欧洲委员会联合研究中心全球植被监测单位协调的2000年全球土地覆盖图（GLC 2000）项目制作的土地覆盖图。2000年中国的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地利用图是由中国科学院制作的，旨在满足大规模资源调查和土地利用制图的需求，用于验证这四个土地覆盖图在中国的准确性。
findingsCn: 结果显示，GLC2000土地覆盖图的准确性最高。MODIS土地覆盖图在类型面积一致性方面排名第二，在与参考数据相比的子分数总体准确性方面排名第三。IGBP土地覆盖图具有良好的标记准确性，尽管存在局部标记错误，并且在类型面积一致性方面排名第三。UMd土地覆盖图的参考数据的标记准确性和类型面积一致性较低。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset used as reference data to validate land cover maps in China?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于验证中国土地覆盖地图的参考数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used as reference data to validate land cover maps in China is the large-scale (1:100 000) land use map of China in 2000, which was produced by the Chinese Academy of Science for large-scale resource surveys and land use mapping. This dataset served as truth to validate other land cover maps over China.
Example.AnswerCn: 中国用于验证土地覆盖地图的参考数据集的一个例子是中国科学院在2000年制作的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地利用图，该图用于大规模资源调查和土地利用制图。该数据集作为真值，用于验证中国其他土地覆盖地图。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features of land-use data collected through remote sensing technologies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 通过遥感技术收集的土地利用数据的关键特征包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: hierarchical classification system, high precision, primary categories like cultivated land, forest, grassland, water bodies, urban areas, unused land
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 分层分类系统，高精度，主要类别包括耕地、森林、草地、水体、城市区域、未利用土地。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the distinctive attributes of land-use change dynamics that are critical for regional analysis?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 土地利用变化动态的独特属性对于区域分析至关重要。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: temporal features, spatial features, patterns of change over time, patterns of change across regions, regional differentiation, socio-economic impacts, environmental impacts
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 时间特征，空间特征，随时间变化的模式，跨区域变化的模式，区域差异，社会经济影响，环境影响

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many scenes of Landsat TM digital images were used to acquire land-use information for the years 1995/1996 and 1999/2000?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 用于获取1995/1996年和1999/2000年土地利用信息的Landsat TM数字图像场景数量是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the scale of the land use map produced by the Chinese Academy of Science for the year 2000?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 中国科学院为2000年制作的土地利用地图的比例尺是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many primary land cover categories does the hierarchical classification system divide the country's land into?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 该层次分类系统将国家的土地划分为多少个主要土地覆盖类别？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using satellite remote sensing in the creation of land-use datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 使用卫星遥感技术在土地利用数据集的创建中具有重要意义。
Definition.AnswerEn: Satellite remote sensing is a critical tool for creating land-use datasets as it allows for large-scale data collection over extensive geographical areas. For instance, Landsat MSS, TM, and ETM data are used to construct detailed land-use maps, enabling the classification of land into specific categories like cropland, forest, grassland, water bodies, urban areas, and unused land. This method provides high precision land-use data crucial for national land resource surveys, hydrology, and ecological research.
Definition.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感是创建土地利用数据集的重要工具，因为它允许对广泛的地理区域进行大规模数据收集。例如，Landsat MSS、TM 和 ETM 数据被用于构建详细的土地利用地图，使土地能够被分类为特定类别，如农田、森林、草地、水体、城市区域和未利用土地。这种方法提供了高精度的土地利用数据，对于国家土地资源调查、水文学和生态研究至关重要。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with comparing different land cover datasets?
Definition.QuestionCn: 比较不同土地覆盖数据集时面临的挑战有哪些？
Definition.AnswerEn: One major challenge in comparing different land cover datasets is the variability in classification systems used by each dataset. This inconsistency makes it difficult to directly compare the data, thereby impacting their applicability in land surface modeling. To address this, datasets often need to be reclassified or aggregated using a unified legend system to facilitate accurate comparison and evaluation.
Definition.AnswerCn: 比较不同土地覆盖数据集的一大挑战是各个数据集使用的分类系统存在差异。这种不一致性使得直接比较数据变得困难，从而影响它们在地表建模中的适用性。为了解决这个问题，数据集通常需要使用统一的图例系统进行重新分类或聚合，以便促进准确的比较和评估。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data sources used for land cover change analysis, and how do these sources influence the findings on regional differentiation of land-use change in China?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 土地覆盖变化分析中使用的数据源有哪些差异，这些数据源如何影响中国地区土地利用变化的差异性发现？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data sources for land cover change analysis include Landsat TM digital images and CBERS-1 data for 1999/2000. These sources influence findings by providing distinct temporal snapshots that reveal regional differentiation of land-use change in China, highlighting areas like North China and the Loess Plateau as regions of rapid change during 1995-2000.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖变化分析的数据来源包括1999/2000年的Landsat TM数字影像和CBERS-1数据。这些来源通过提供不同的时间快照，揭示了中国土地利用变化的区域差异，突显了1995-2000年期间北方地区和黄土高原等快速变化的区域。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the accuracy and consistency of the MODIS land cover map compare to the GLC2000 map, and how might these differences affect their application in environmental monitoring?
Comparison.QuestionCn: MODIS土地覆盖地图的准确性和一致性与GLC2000地图相比如何，这些差异可能如何影响它们在环境监测中的应用？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The MODIS land cover map ranks second for type area consistency and third for sub-fraction overall accuracy compared to the GLC2000 map, which has the highest accuracy. These differences can affect their application in environmental monitoring, with GLC2000 being potentially more reliable for accurate representation, while MODIS may require additional calibration or validation efforts.
Comparison.AnswerCn: MODIS土地覆盖地图在类型面积一致性方面排名第二，在子分数整体准确性方面排名第三，而GLC2000地图的准确性最高。这些差异可能会影响它们在环境监测中的应用，GLC2000可能在准确表示方面更可靠，而MODIS可能需要额外的校准或验证工作。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What implications can be drawn from the use of Landsat TM and CBERS-1 data in understanding regional land-use changes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 使用Landsat TM和CBERS-1数据理解区域土地利用变化可以得出哪些启示？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The utilization of Landsat TM and CBERS-1 data suggests a comprehensive approach to capturing land-use changes over time, providing insights into the temporal and spatial features of land-use dynamics. This approach helps in understanding the regional differentiation and rapid changes in land-use patterns, particularly in areas like North China and the Loess Plateau.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 利用Landsat TM和CBERS-1数据表明了一种全面的方法，用于捕捉土地利用变化，提供了对土地利用动态的时间和空间特征的深入了解。这种方法有助于理解区域差异和土地利用模式的快速变化，特别是在像华北和黄土高原这样的地区。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do different classification systems in land cover maps affect the interpretation of land-use data, and what adjustments might be needed for consistency?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 不同的土地覆盖地图分类系统如何影响土地利用数据的解读，以及为了保持一致性可能需要进行哪些调整。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Different classification systems can complicate the comparison and interpretation of land-use data, as they may not align with each other or with the needs of land surface modeling. To improve consistency, it may be necessary to reclassify data using a unified legend system or transfer existing classification systems to more commonly recognized ones for better accuracy and comparability.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 不同的分类系统可能会使土地利用数据的比较和解释变得复杂，因为它们可能彼此不一致或与土地表面建模的需求不符。为了提高一致性，可能需要使用统一的图例系统对数据进行重新分类，或将现有的分类系统转移到更常见的分类中，以提高准确性和可比性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the challenges of balancing urban expansion and arable land protection from the observed patterns of land-use change in China?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从中国土地利用变化的观察模式中，可以推断出在城市扩张与耕地保护之间平衡所面临的挑战。
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The observed patterns indicate significant conflicts between urban expansion and arable land protection, highlighting challenges in managing land resources effectively. This suggests a need for policies that better balance developmental pressures with the preservation of essential agricultural lands, to prevent irrational land conversions and ensure sustainable land-use management.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 观察到的模式表明，城市扩张与耕地保护之间存在显著冲突，突显了有效管理土地资源的挑战。这表明需要制定更好地平衡发展压力与保护重要农业用地的政策，以防止不合理的土地转用，并确保可持续的土地利用管理。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in achieving high accuracy in land cover classification systems used in large-scale datasets?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在大规模数据集的土地覆盖分类系统中，实现高准确度面临的挑战因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges include different classification systems used by various datasets, making comparison difficult. Additionally, the accuracies of all datasets may not meet the requirements of land surface modeling, which suggests a need for a well-recognized classification system commonly used in such modeling.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 挑战包括不同数据集使用的分类系统，使得比较变得困难。此外，所有数据集的准确性可能无法满足土地表面建模的要求，这表明需要一个在此类建模中广泛使用的公认分类系统。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying reasons for the conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion in China, and how do these conflicts impact data collection methods?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 中国耕地保护与城市扩张之间冲突的根本原因是什么，这些冲突如何影响数据收集方法？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion arise from the irrational conversion from arable land to built-up areas. These conflicts highlight the need for data collection methods that can accurately capture and reflect the rapid changes in land use, particularly in areas prone to such conflicts.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 耕地保护与城市扩张之间的冲突源于耕地向建筑用地的不合理转化。这些冲突凸显了需要采用能够准确捕捉和反映土地利用快速变化的数据收集方法，特别是在那些容易发生此类冲突的地区。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of utilizing a multi-tiered land cover classification system in the development of large-scale land use datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在开发大规模土地利用数据集时，利用多层次土地覆盖分类系统的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing a multi-tiered land cover classification system allows for more detailed and precise categorization of land use types, which can enhance the dataset's accuracy and applicability in national resource surveys, hydrological, and ecological research. This approach supports a deeper understanding of land-use changes and their temporal and spatial dynamics, facilitating more effective policy formulation and environmental monitoring.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用多层次的土地覆盖分类系统可以更详细和精确地对土地使用类型进行分类，从而提高数据集在国家资源调查、水文和生态研究中的准确性和适用性。这种方法支持对土地使用变化及其时间和空间动态的更深入理解，有助于更有效的政策制定和环境监测。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential impacts of integrating global land cover datasets, such as MODIS or GLC2000, with regional datasets in improving land surface models?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合全球土地覆盖数据集，如MODIS或GLC2000，与区域数据集，可能对改善地表模型产生的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating global land cover datasets with regional datasets can enhance the accuracy and applicability of land surface models by providing a more holistic view of land cover changes. This integration helps overcome limitations associated with individual datasets, such as classification errors or local inconsistencies, and enables a more comprehensive assessment of land-use impacts on ecological and hydrological processes. However, it also requires careful reconciliation of different classification systems and consideration of the specific regional context to ensure meaningful and reliable model outputs.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将全球土地覆盖数据集与区域数据集进行整合，可以通过提供更全面的土地覆盖变化视角来提高土地表面模型的准确性和适用性。这种整合有助于克服单个数据集的局限性，例如分类错误或地方不一致性，并能够更全面地评估土地利用对生态和水文过程的影响。然而，这也需要仔细调和不同的分类系统，并考虑特定区域的背景，以确保模型输出的意义和可靠性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures could be implemented to enhance the accuracy of land cover classification using satellite imagery in land-use studies?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以实施哪些程序来提高使用卫星影像进行土地利用研究的土地覆盖分类的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The use of satellite imagery such as Landsat TM and CBERS-1 data provides foundational land-use information. However, challenges in classification accuracy can be addressed by using a unified legend system for comparison, as seen with the reclassification of the four land cover datasets over China. This approach helps in creating compatibility across different classification systems to improve accuracy for land surface modeling.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 使用卫星影像，如Landsat TM和CBERS-1数据，提供了基础的土地利用信息。然而，通过使用统一的图例系统进行比较，可以解决分类精度的挑战，正如对中国四个土地覆盖数据集的重新分类所示。这种方法有助于在不同分类系统之间创建兼容性，从而提高土地表面建模的准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can remote sensing technologies be employed to detect and analyze temporal changes in land use across large geographical areas?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 遥感技术如何被用于检测和分析大范围地理区域内的土地利用时间变化。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Remote sensing technologies utilize satellite data like Landsat MSS, TM, and ETM to conduct macro surveys and dynamic research on land use. These technologies help in understanding temporal and spatial features of land-use changes by integrating 'spatial pattern' and 'temporal process' analyses, which can reveal regional characteristics and patterns of dynamic processes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 遥感技术利用卫星数据，如Landsat MSS、TM和ETM，进行宏观调查和土地利用的动态研究。这些技术通过整合“空间模式”和“时间过程”分析，帮助理解土地利用变化的时间特征和空间特征，从而揭示区域特征和动态过程的模式。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods can be used to validate land cover datasets against reference data to ensure reliability in environmental modeling?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 可以使用哪些方法对土地覆盖数据集进行验证，以确保在环境建模中的可靠性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Validation of land cover datasets can be achieved by using a large-scale map, such as the 1:100 000 land cover map of China, as reference data. By aggregating and reclassifying datasets to a unified legend system, the comparison and evaluation of different land cover maps can be performed, ensuring their accuracy and consistency for use in environmental modeling.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖数据集的验证可以通过使用大规模地图，例如中国的1:100 000土地覆盖地图，作为参考数据来实现。通过将数据集聚合和重新分类为统一的图例系统，可以对不同的土地覆盖地图进行比较和评估，从而确保它们在环境建模中的准确性和一致性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do remote sensing technologies enable the creation of reliable land cover maps at various scales for environmental monitoring?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 遥感技术如何在不同尺度上支持可靠土地覆盖地图的创建，以便进行环境监测？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Remote sensing technologies provide data for creating land cover maps at global, continental, and regional scales. These maps are derived from various sources such as MODIS and GLC2000, and serve the fundamental purpose of improving land cover information for scientific studies and environmental monitoring.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 遥感技术提供数据用于在全球、洲际和区域尺度上创建土地覆盖图。这些地图来源于各种来源，如MODIS和GLC2000，旨在改善科学研究和环境监测的土地覆盖信息。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or frameworks need to be established to ensure the compatibility and accuracy of land cover classification systems in global datasets?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了确保全球数据集中土地覆盖分类系统的兼容性和准确性，需要建立哪些条件或框架？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Establishing a unified legend system and using large-scale reference data, such as the 1:100 000 land cover map of China, ensures compatibility and accuracy in classification systems across global datasets. This approach addresses challenges related to differing classification systems and data accuracy requirements for land surface modeling.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 建立统一的图例系统并使用大规模参考数据，例如中国的1:100,000土地覆盖图，可以确保全球数据集分类系统的兼容性和准确性。这种方法解决了与不同分类系统和土地表面建模的数据准确性要求相关的挑战。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be discrepancies in classification systems between different land cover datasets, and what are the implications for data collection methods?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 不同土地覆盖数据集之间的分类系统可能存在差异的原因是什么，这对数据收集方法有什么影响？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The four maps used different classification systems, which made the comparison difficult. This suggests that data collection methods may need to adapt their classification systems to ensure compatibility and reliability for land surface modelling.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 这四张地图使用了不同的分类系统，这使得比较变得困难。这表明数据收集方法可能需要调整其分类系统，以确保土地表面建模的兼容性和可靠性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might be expected when trying to reverse deforestation trends using remote sensing datasets, and how can data collection techniques address these challenges?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在尝试利用遥感数据集逆转森林砍伐趋势时，可能会遇到哪些挑战，以及数据收集技术如何应对这些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is too early to say that the trend of deforestation has been effectively reversed across China, indicating that current data collection techniques may need to be enhanced to better monitor and address the conflicts between arable land protection and urban expansion.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 目前还为时尚早，无法说中国的森林砍伐趋势已经有效逆转，这表明当前的数据收集技术可能需要加强，以更好地监测和解决耕地保护与城市扩张之间的冲突。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might existing land cover datasets not meet the accuracy requirements for land surface modelling, and what improvements in data collection methods could be anticipated to address this?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 现有的土地覆盖数据集可能无法满足土地表面建模的准确性要求，原因可能包括数据的时效性、空间分辨率不足、分类精度不高以及缺乏对动态变化的及时更新等。为了应对这些问题，预计在数据收集方法上会有以下改进：采用更高分辨率的遥感技术、利用无人机和地面传感器进行更精细的监测、结合机器学习和人工智能技术提高数据处理和分类的准确性，以及加强多源数据的融合与验证。
Expectation.AnswerEn: The accuracies of all the datasets cannot meet the requirements of land surface modelling, suggesting that improvements might include developing a new land cover map with a classification compatible with a well-accepted legend system and increased accuracy.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 所有数据集的准确性都无法满足土地表面建模的要求，这表明改进的方向可能包括开发一个与公认图例系统兼容的新土地覆盖图，并提高准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using remote sensing data, such as Landsat and CBERS-1, in capturing detailed land-use changes across diverse regions in China?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您将如何评估使用遥感数据（如Landsat和CBERS-1）在捕捉中国各个地区的详细土地利用变化方面的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Remote sensing data like Landsat and CBERS-1 are highly effective for capturing detailed land-use changes due to their ability to provide extensive temporal and spatial coverage. They offer valuable insights into regional differentiation of land-use change, especially for periods like 1995-2000 in China, which is crucial for understanding regional scale changes and informing land management policies.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 遥感数据如Landsat和CBERS-1在捕捉详细的土地利用变化方面非常有效，因为它们能够提供广泛的时间和空间覆盖。它们为区域土地利用变化的差异化提供了宝贵的见解，尤其是在1995-2000年期间的中国，这对于理解区域规模的变化和为土地管理政策提供信息至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your opinion on the challenges faced when comparing different land cover datasets, especially regarding classification system differences and accuracy requirements for land surface modeling?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对比较不同土地覆盖数据集时面临的挑战，特别是关于分类系统差异和土地表面建模的准确性要求的看法是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The challenges are significant when comparing different land cover datasets due to varied classification systems, which complicates direct comparisons and aggregation efforts. Accuracy remains a critical issue, as shown by the need to use a well-recognized legend system for land surface modeling, indicating that current datasets may not fully meet modeling requirements.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在比较不同的土地覆盖数据集时，挑战是显著的，因为分类系统的差异使得直接比较和聚合工作变得复杂。准确性仍然是一个关键问题，这表明需要使用公认的图例系统进行土地表面建模，说明当前的数据集可能无法完全满足建模要求。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your view, what are the potential advantages and limitations of using a large-scale land use map, like the 1:100 000 map of China, as a reference for validating global land cover maps?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在我看来，使用大规模土地利用地图，如中国的1:100 000地图，作为验证全球土地覆盖地图的参考，具有潜在的优势和局限性。
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Using a large-scale land use map as a reference offers the advantage of high resolution and detail, which can improve validation accuracy. However, limitations include the potential for misalignment in classification systems and the need for adaptation to global datasets' scales and purposes, which might affect comparability and the overall validation process.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用大规模土地利用地图作为参考的优势在于其高分辨率和细节，这可以提高验证的准确性。然而，局限性包括分类系统可能存在的不一致性，以及需要适应全球数据集的规模和目的，这可能影响可比性和整体验证过程。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how remote sensing data can be effectively utilized for creating accurate land cover maps.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何有效利用遥感数据来创建准确的土地覆盖图。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Remote sensing data from sources like Landsat MSS, TM, ETM, and CBERS-1 are utilized to construct detailed land cover maps by using a hierarchical land cover classification system. This method allows for differentiation into primary classes such as cropland, forest, grassland, and more. The data facilitate the mapping of large areas efficiently and are instrumental in applications like resource survey and land use modeling.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 遥感数据来自于Landsat MSS、TM、ETM和CBERS-1等来源，利用分层土地覆盖分类系统构建详细的土地覆盖图。这种方法允许将土地覆盖区分为主要类别，如农田、森林、草地等。这些数据有效地促进了大面积的制图，并在资源调查和土地利用建模等应用中发挥了重要作用。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced in comparing land cover datasets from different sources.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对比较来自不同来源的土地覆盖数据集所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges in comparing land cover datasets arise primarily due to differences in classification systems used by different datasets, which makes direct comparison difficult. Additionally, the existing datasets have varying levels of accuracy that may not meet the requirements of land surface modeling, necessitating the reclassification of data to a unified legend system for effective comparison.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 比较土地覆盖数据集时面临的挑战主要源于不同数据集使用的分类系统差异，这使得直接比较变得困难。此外，现有数据集的准确性水平各异，可能无法满足土地表面建模的要求，因此需要将数据重新分类为统一的图例系统，以便进行有效比较。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why there is such significant regional differentiation in land-use change across China.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么中国的土地利用变化存在如此显著的区域差异。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Significant regional differentiation in land-use change across China can be attributed to varied physical environments and vast land areas, which influence social and economic development differently. Rapid changes have been observed in regions like North China and the Loess Plateau due to their specific agricultural and urbanization dynamics, impacting both local and global environmental changes.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 中国土地利用变化的显著区域差异可以归因于不同的自然环境和广阔的土地面积，这些因素以不同的方式影响社会和经济发展。在北方地区和黄土高原等地区，由于特定的农业和城市化动态，观察到了快速变化，这对地方和全球环境变化产生了影响。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore and summarize the different data collection techniques used for land-use/cover change studies in China, focusing on the integration of remote sensing technologies like Landsat and CBERS.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨并总结在中国土地利用/覆盖变化研究中使用的不同数据收集技术，重点关注遥感技术的整合，如Landsat和CBERS。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The data collection techniques for land-use/cover change studies in China have primarily relied on satellite remote sensing technologies. Landsat TM digital images, consisting of multiple scenes from different years, have been a significant source, providing detailed temporal and spatial data. Additionally, the CBERS-1 (China-Brazil Earth Resources Satellite 1) data were utilized to complement the collection, offering broader coverage and enhancing land-use information accuracy for specific periods.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 中国的土地利用/覆盖变化研究的数据收集技术主要依赖于卫星遥感技术。Landsat TM数字图像，包含来自不同年份的多个场景，成为重要的数据来源，提供了详细的时间和空间数据。此外，CBERS-1（中巴地球资源卫星1号）数据也被用于补充收集，提供更广泛的覆盖范围，并提高特定时期土地利用信息的准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate potential strategies for enhancing the accuracy and reliability of land cover maps used in global environmental change studies, particularly within the context of China.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查提高用于全球环境变化研究的土地覆盖地图准确性和可靠性的潜在策略，特别是在中国的背景下。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Enhancing the accuracy and reliability of land cover maps can be approached by integrating multiple datasets and using advanced remote sensing technologies. Evaluating and comparing existing maps against a reliable reference dataset, such as the large-scale (1:100,000) land use map of China, can help identify discrepancies and improve consistency. Developing a new map that aligns with a recognized classification system and employing cross-validation with high-accuracy datasets, like GLC2000, could further ensure reliability.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 提高土地覆盖地图的准确性和可靠性可以通过整合多个数据集和使用先进的遥感技术来实现。评估和比较现有地图与可靠的参考数据集，例如中国的大比例尺（1:100,000）土地利用图，可以帮助识别差异并改善一致性。开发一个与公认分类系统对齐的新地图，并利用高精度数据集（如GLC2000）进行交叉验证，进一步确保可靠性。
